Hairbrush with built-in detangling spray: A hairbrush with a detangling spray attached to it would make it easier for people to brush their hair without having to worry about tangles and knots. The detangling spray would be released from the brush handle and would help to loosen and remove any tangles or knots in the hair.

Hairbrush with built-in hair dryer: A hairbrush with a built-in hair dryer would be a convenient and time-saving solution for people who want to dry their hair quickly and easily. The hair dryer would be attached to the brush handle and would be able to heat up and dry the hair as it is being brushed.

Hairbrush with adjustable bristles: A hairbrush with adjustable bristles would be a great solution for people who have different hair types and textures. The bristles would be able to be adjusted to be softer or firmer, depending on the needs of the user.

Hairbrush with built-in straightener: A hairbrush with a built-in straightener would be a convenient and time-saving solution for people who want to straighten their hair quickly and easily. The straightener would be attached to the brush handle and would be able to heat up and straighten the hair as it is being brushed.

Hairbrush with built-in scalp massage brush: A hairbrush with a built-in scalp massage brush would be a great solution for people who want to improve the health and appearance of their scalp. The scalp massage brush would be attached to the handle of the hairbrush and would be able to massage the scalp as the hair is being brushed, promoting blood flow and improving scalp health.
